title: Joga
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat; veg options available. Juice bar/cafe sharing space with a yoga studio. Most menu items are raw vegan or vegan. Daily offerings include soups, wraps, salads, spring rolls, zucchini noodles. Juices are cold pressed using a hydraulic press. Food is pre-packaged to take away or dine on the al fresco terrace with views of the lagoon.
